titles.title: We Have A Lord Who Has Transformed Our Lives

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have a Lord who has transformed our lives, And His name is the Lord Jesus Christ. He lives in us, being our power To live for each hour, Transforming us till we’re like Him.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We called upon His name, He entered our hearts, His spirit now dwells in us. He’s really all we need, Bread, water and air And shelter for us.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
